website_summaries.verdict: This basic, durable springform pan gets the job done.
pros: Durable heavy gauge steel construction with nontoxic nonstick coating
7-inch size fits several models of pressure cookers
cons: Some experience leaks, which can happen if the correct side isn't facing up
Check carefully before you put batter in

customer_reviews.title: Awesome..... UPDATED review
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I use it for so many things.. Updated...so got to update this review... though it did work great the first few times I used it... but now it won't hold the bottom pan at all after only using it a few times... and has gaps around it so everything seeps out making a big mess... Big disappointment😕 don't know if you can see the light coming through on the pics I provided
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly in my Instant Pot. Did not leak ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in my Instant Pot. Did not leak and was exactly what I had hoped for in making cheesecake. Will use it for lasagna also.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous23

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the tray!
customer_reviews.text: I like the pan. It works well. One big caveat, however... The tray part of the pan has a small (about 1/16") lip on it. The tray may be used with the lip in the up position or the down position. I strongly suggest putting it in the down position so your cheesecake or whatever you cook in it can slide off the tray easily. Otherwise you have to pry whatever you're cooking over the lip to extract it from the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pressure Cooker Baking
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit that the red color caught my eye when searching for a springform pan that I could use in my new red pressure cooker. Unlike other pans, this one is sturdy and the nonstick finish looks to be more durable than most. It locks together tightly though I still wrap it with aluminum foil as a precaution against leakage or moisture getting into the batter. I have 'baked' both a pumpkin and a red velvet cheesecake in the pan and both were done to perfection. I may be adding another of these to my collection and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Mine leaks but still usuable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6 qt. IP. I've used it twice to make an egg frittata in the IP. Both times it leaked. Second time I put foil around the bottom. This seemed to help but I still wish it was completely leak proof. Good point is that it is very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: PJCAI

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my 6qt instant pot and I am not impressed at all! When I took it apart to initially wash it, there was a little spot of rust in one of the seams. Ok, I let that go and went to use it for the first time....ummmm it doesn't hold anything lol - leaks like crazy!!!! Guess I will not be using this for baking desserts, maybe just for meatloaf/lasagna in the IP. Not impressed though as I have to buy another item to bake in.
customer_reviews.author: Merinda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit in my pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love to use my pressure cooker. However, not everything can be made using the racks or the steamer. So I purchased this pan to use in my pressure cooker. It fit perfectly, cleans easily and since it is a springform, food comes out easy. If you use your pressure cooker and don't have one of these, you are missing out!
customer_reviews.author: MN Barn Goddess

customer_reviews.title: NOT leakproof for me!
customer_reviews.text: Both times I've used this pan, it has leaked. The first time I used it, my oven was smoking and needed a clean job afterwards. The second time, I knew to put it in another pan. The heavy cream I topped the egg/cheese filling with, seeped out of the pan. Otherwise, I like the ease with which the pan releases the cooked dish.
customer_reviews.author: JG Swineford

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: It leaks (even using parchment paper rounds on the bottom) but I think all springform pans leak. I use it for things that are thick and will not run through it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 6 Qt Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to make cheesecakes and lasagna in my Instant Pot. No need to spray or butter - no food sticks. I used parchment paper on the bottom one time and it was not needed. This pan does not leak!! Cleans up quick - I hand washed and was quick and easy. Great pan - recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Came back to change my review from 5 to 1 star. Pan completely fell apart after only 2 uses- the two rivets to hold the latch in place snapped off rending the pan completely useless. Wish I had made cheesecakes in it sooner so I could still return it. So annoying!!
customer_reviews.author: ariehunt

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well
customer_reviews.text: I make sour dough bread once a week and use this spring form pan to hold the hydrated dough in a round shape while baking in my Emile Henry Cloche at 470°. The loaf turns out beautifully with no cleanup needed. The non-stick surface does not need any spray,oil or floured sides.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Bates

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan, but there are some problems
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in my Instant Pot. It is the perfect size for it. I love the color. I used it for an egg frittata. It came other fine, but the springform pan leaked some of the egg mixture. It was also difficult to clean. Egg got into the places where the metal is curved over at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: OscarsMom2

customer_reviews.title: Seller was amazing very fast service
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I can use in my instant pot and my air fryer! It makes one nice cake for the two of us instead of us making a three layer cake because we don't need the calories of a triple layer cake lol
customer_reviews.author: Kitten T Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works perfectly for cheesecake in an InstantPot
customer_reviews.text: Works really well in my Instant Pot Ultra 6 qt. It's a perfect fit in the stainless pot. Holds contents without leaking, and releases cooked food easily. So far I've only used it for cheesecake recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Fadero

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly in my 6Qt Instantpot
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for making cheese cakes to take to all of my holiday gatherings this year. I found a recipe to make them in my instant pot and my current spring form pan was too big to fit in my 6QT IP. I bought these and they worked really well. So far, they have held up. Time will tell. I have gotten a few small superficial scratches from using a pie cutter, so I would recommend getting the entire cheesecake off of the base and only a serving plate before using anything to cut.
customer_reviews.author: KarisD

customer_reviews.title: Must have for instantpot.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pan. Used it twice to make cheesecake in the instant pot and it worked beautifully. Instantpot cheesecake really is amazing!! Gave it to my daughter for her new instantpot and bought myself another one!!!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Fits Quisinart 6 qt CPC-600 pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in the Quisinart 6 quart electric pressure cooker, model CPC-600. Room for two stacked. (Pictured here on top of standard trivet... top at the 8 cup mark). Using Instant Pot Silicone Steam Rack (with handles) as a lifter (B01LOP6G7A). Nice clean release of pressure cooker quiche with muenster cheese crust.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Shopper JJW

customer_reviews.title: Instant Pot - 7" size fits great. So far we have not seen leakage some ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use in 6qt. Instant Pot - 7" size fits great. So far we have not seen leakage some reported, but only made cheesecake for now. Just in case like many suggested we put the foil outside in case it did leak. I would agree, putting parchment paper (at least on the bottom) would make it easier to slide the cheesecake onto a platter, and also will speed up the cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Watch Wearer

customer_reviews.title: Cooking Made Easy!!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product for making cakes in the instapot!! We used it for Thanksgiving and it added just the perfect touch and finished treat for all. Really easy to use and easy to clean!! Great Job, Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McClure

customer_reviews.title: Great Size for Instant Pot pressure cooker desserts
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan - -I ordered it to make cakes, tortes and cheesecakes in an Instant Pot pressure cooker - - it is just the right size - and with the instant pot - a dessert cooks so fast and is just the right size for sharing with just a few friends, a couple or a small family - - I got two so that I can make up a regular size batch and then cook them one after another - - -
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E Blair, M,S., Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for instant pot
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly into a 6qt instant pot. I’ve made a cheesecake and key lime pie and they both did great in this pan. They stuck a little to the bottom, but I probably should’ve sprayed it with something.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Could be deeper but otherwise very good.
customer_reviews.text: The pan is the perfect width and worked well in my Instant Pot. My only problem was that it was not deep enough for the cheesecake I made. It is only about 2" and the recipe called for 3". But I made it work with aluminum foil.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Who said camping couldn’t be done with an instant pot
customer_reviews.text: This form pan is great. I did wrap it in foil just in case it cooked over the sides. I used it to make an egg bake in my instant pot like cooker. It was perfect
customer_reviews.author: mary jo

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan for 8 Quart pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it only twice so far at Thanksgiving. Made a delicious pumpkin pie. Great pan fits inside my 8 quart Insta Pot. Cleaning requires some diligence in the creases but that’s not unusual.
customer_reviews.author: CTO110

customer_reviews.title: Works well, cute color
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I know springform pans are typically for cheesecake, but it works well for regular cakes. Too. I made my husband's birthday cake with it. Great product. I also like the color. It's a nice break from the usual gray pans.
customer_reviews.author: JENNA G.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it . Have used it twice so far. Liked it so well I bought one for each of my 3 girls so they could make cheese cake in their instant pot. Fits great in my 6 qt pot.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I have only used it once so far so we will see how it holds up but it worked great for my 1st cheesecake in my instant pot and ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was just as described. shipping was fast and product was packaged well. I have only used it once so far so we will see how it holds up but it worked great for my 1st cheesecake in my instant pot and cleans up well.
customer_reviews.author: ssandman

customer_reviews.title: Worst springform pan ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst springform pan ever. I bought it specifically to use in my instant pot since I already own a 9 inch that won't fit inside. The bottom doesn't sit securely after being latched. First time I used it I lifted the pan and the bottom fell out, even though I it was locked, and I had Graham cracker crust allover my floor. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: It worked well
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once so far but it worked perfectly for what I needed and cleaned up nicely. I was making a a Mocha Icebox cake that did not have to be baked. After being refrigerated for several hours, the cake came out perfectly from the pan. Don't know about the durability but looks pretty solidly made.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make a cake in the instant pot. It turned out great and the clasp was helpful to get the cake out and keep the perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: godesseyes

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, durability and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this once since purchase, but it is easy to use and clean. Plus the color is beautiful. Fits my 6 qt. Instant Pot perfectly !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great small pan for cheesecakes!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the pan! It fit well in my 6qt instant pot. Although it is a small pan and I had almost half of my cheesecake filling leftover. I just made a second one! It cleans up well. It opens easily to remove the cake and clean, but it took me a few minutes to figure out how to reassemble it properly.
customer_reviews.author: cindy McMath

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my Instant Pot, and I'm really happy with it. My greek yogurt cheesecake came out perfect (still can't believe I can make cheesecake in the Instant Pot). The pan has a nice weight to it, and the non-stick finish is nicely done. It closes tightly so nothing leaks, and clean-up was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these for holiday cheesecakes. Love the color, but not all of the pans seal correctly and some of the batter leaked out.
customer_reviews.author: brrritt86

customer_reviews.title: Only 2” deep
customer_reviews.text: I returned this pan because it was only a 2” and because I wanted it for cheesecake and lasagna, I needed a 3” deep. I looked like a very nice pan though.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cheesecake in pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.text: made a cheese cake in my pressure cooker and this worked beautifully. tried water in it first and no leaks. Easy clean up too. I can recommend this and if the need arises would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Order your accessories they are wonderful to have
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan for all sorts of things lasagna to cheese cake fits great in my 6 and it’s plenty of room for a family of 3 and company that come over for wings and snacks quick and super great
customer_reviews.author: Angie B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits 6 quart instant pot. Made one cheesecake in ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits 6 quart instant pot. Made one cheesecake in it so far and it worked as advertised. Have to make lifting straps from aluminum foil to enable you to remove it from pot after cooking.
customer_reviews.author: toots

customer_reviews.title: Cheesecake up
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping it was slightly bigger but that's my mistake nonetheless I have used it many times specially for cheese cake comes out easily perfect size actually happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anabel noj

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my 6qt InstantPot
customer_reviews.text: Made a cheesecake for thanksgiving, the shipping was fast and arrived in perfect condition. Very durable - I forgot to take the cake off the bottom and my dad kept trying to slice into it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cute little pan. I had got the 10 inch ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little pan. I had got the 10 inch but didn't fit in three instant pot so sent that back and got the smaller one. This was a gift so I personally have not used it. I gaff no problems worth ordering Ann's it arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Robin H

customer_reviews.title: Great for making cheesecake in the Instapot
customer_reviews.text: Great for making cheesecake in the Instapot. Only gave it four star as it can sometimes be hard to tell if the bottom is locked in properly.
customer_reviews.author: MK in MI

customer_reviews.title: Useless because it leaks
customer_reviews.text: A springform pan is supposed to seal itself. This one leaks terribly. I’ve only used it three times.
customer_reviews.author: DenverGuy

customer_reviews.title: Bottom gives out easily
customer_reviews.text: The bottom gave out as I was putting it in the oven and you can only guess how epic the mess was to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Class Action

customer_reviews.title: Great size for a small family
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a small family! I've used it once to make cheesecake- I make a 2/3 recipe of a classic for a 9" pan. The crust did slick, so either butter the pan liberally or line pan with parchment paper. Tight ring & no leaking. I recommend this cake pan-4 2/3 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Leabch

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I bought two of these to use in an Instant Pot. They worked like a charm. No leaks. No sticking. Easy Clean up. Nice finishes inside and out.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: TINY edges
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the perfect size for the insta pot, BUT it has such low walls that its essentially useless for making anything of substnce
customer_reviews.author: Kasi

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 7" spring pan to use in my Instant Pot. I actually used it to make a lasagna, which came out delicious. Will be making a cheesecake later this week. Wonderful little pan.
customer_reviews.author: JLew

customer_reviews.title: Was able to get the cheesecake out easily.
customer_reviews.text: I made cheesecake in it and it worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Leaked the first time I tried to use it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Leaked the first time I tried to use it. I tried opening and closing multiple times to make sure it wasn’t user error. It wasn’t!!! Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Barton

customer_reviews.title: Great cooking cheesecake in my Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.text: Item fits my Instant Pot ( I have the 8 quart, but the friend who recommended this item has the 6 quart) perfectly, and does not leak. Easy to use, and I look forward to using it many times.
customer_reviews.author: Twin2th

customer_reviews.title: Fits small Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: This product was what I was looking for ... it fits in my Instant Pot.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Not very good for baking boxed cake mix in an Instant Pot presurrized cooker.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this pan because it will not hold a boxed cake mix cake. It will run over as you cook it in an Instant Pot. Be nice if the sides were 3".
customer_reviews.author: Old Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Leakproof
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute little pan, but definitely feels flimsy and I tested with water before cooking in it and it definitely leaks. I’m not sure that it will be effective for the way I intended to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: Made My Cheesecake
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting to make my first cheesecake and this pan made it possible. Worked perfectly in my 6qt Instapot.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits IP but not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Used 1 time and already showing some rust spots. Also ran a knife gently around the inside perimeter and scratched the coating off.
customer_reviews.author: D & E

customer_reviews.title: Makes Amazing Cheesecake!!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it is supposed to! Get one today and see what else your IP can do for you.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P

customer_reviews.title: Great in my instant pot
customer_reviews.text: Was just as described and pictured! Cake came out very good in my instant pot!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice little cake pan, and it works great. Everyone enjoys the cake baked with this, and it's east to clean up due to the non-stick feature. Would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect springform pan
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the Instant Pot I just recently purchased. It fits inside the pot perfectly and I just made a really delicious salted Carmel cheesecake with this pan that came out great. A great sturdy pan with a solid spring.
customer_reviews.author: slinderman

customer_reviews.title: Pan was a perfect fit and cleaned up easily
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as an accessory for my 6-qt Instant Pot. Made a Breakfast Banana Bread in my IP ... yummy! Pan was a perfect fit and cleaned up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Byer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the 6qt InstaPot
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright red color of this piece (silly I know) and it's very easy to clean- fits perfect in the 6qt InstaPot
customer_reviews.author: TRACY

customer_reviews.title: You’ll not regret this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my IP! Can’t wait to masked my newest purchase—cheesecake-/YUM!!!
customer_reviews.author: NanC V. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 6qt Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6qt Instant Pot. Used it this weekend, no issues, but handwashing will probably be best. I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: JShaffer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful 7" Springform Cake Pan
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for using with the Instant Pot electric pressure cooker. I bought several for family members who also use the Instant Pot and they were pleased and surprised. They arrived on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H. Haney

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: We used it to bake some japanese cheesecake to follow the hype and it worked pretty well, wish I took some pictures of the finished products but very easy to use, easy to clean if prepped correctly and does exactly as it's described to do.
customer_reviews.author: IndoHippo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I got the pan with scratches and a dent in it. It was as if someone had used and abused it, then returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IS NOT LEAKPROOF!
customer_reviews.text: According to the product description: "Spring latch offering a tight leak-proof seal makes baking mess-free with an easy cleanup." Except that it's not. Upon my first attempt to use this and make an egg souffle in my instant pot, the egg leaked all over the place. See attached photo. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: James K. Yoo

customer_reviews.title: Works in Instant Pot
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Fixed a cheesecake in my Instant Pot and it worked great. Also did lasagna. Turned out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Reads4fun

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Its a simple Nonstick springform pan and Leakproof unless you are like me and use a lot of butter to wear it leaks...but for the most part I like it!
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: Made a great cheesecake. I do wrap in foil for peace ...
customer_reviews.text: Used in my Instant Pot Duo 60. Fits perfectly. Made a great cheesecake. I do wrap in foil for peace of mind to prevent leakage. Nice and sturdy. I highly recommend this pan, it's a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: 4Jeeperz

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This springform pan leaked the first time I used it. It’s being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Theladydothprotest

customer_reviews.title: It delivers and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and works great made a cheesecake right away and it came it perfect. No leaking
customer_reviews.author: Truth Be Told Gillam

customer_reviews.title: Great Size😋
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. And a perfect size for a reduction in servings.
customer_reviews.author: deerose

customer_reviews.title: no issues
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Easy to use and clean. Perfect for my instant pot! Delivery was on time. Happy cooking for me!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, GOOD price & fast service and serves me as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Judson M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Extremely quick delivery and product was actually better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Instant Pot!
customer_reviews.text: My pan arrived quickly and was well wrapped for safe mailing. It is perfect for use in my instant pot. I’ve already made 2 delicious cheesecakes and plan a 3rd before the end of the week. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pan works well with my instant pot cooker.
customer_reviews.author: SueD

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: It holds up in the dishwasher and that’s all that matters. I hate hand washing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Non stick lining chipped easily along the wall. Difficult to open. Spring detached after about 6 uses making it impossible to use. Do not but this item if you want a quality produst that lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Harriet

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Perfect size for my 6qt Instant Pot. Makes great breads, cakes and meatloaf.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M Haegele

customer_reviews.title: Works with Cornbread
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine in our Instant Pot. When I made cornbread, I greased the sides and bottom with Crisco vegetable shortening. The cornbread released from the pan without sticking at all.
customer_reviews.author: Harry M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits inside the Instant Poy
customer_reviews.text: Great little pan. I use it in the Instant Pot for lasagna and cheese cake.
customer_reviews.author: Odie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for instant pot cheesecakes
customer_reviews.text: Works great, did add parchment paper cut out on the bottoms for cheese cake.
customer_reviews.author: number1customer

customer_reviews.title: worked great. a little sharp on inside by the buckle
customer_reviews.text: worked great. It is sharp on inside by the buckle. high quality besides that. a steamed cake was really new and different to me. really yummy in my electronic pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Chillio cool cool

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy for price!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Was the perfect size for my pressure cooker, and sealed well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning because I realized I wanted an 8".
customer_reviews.author: cakemom

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's great. I did not have any leakage, but I lined the bottom with parchment before filling the pan. It's the perfect size for making cheesecake in my instant pot duo, so I'm pleased!
customer_reviews.author: L. Spare

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size for our instantpot
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this to make cheesecake in our instantpot.

customer_reviews.title: love the color got it very quick
customer_reviews.text: bought it to use in my Electric Pressure cooker but have not used it yet. love the color got it very quick.

customer_reviews.title: The pan easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I made a cake . It came right out of the pan with ease. The pan easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: vivian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my instant pot and I made a lovely chocolate cheesecake.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first time, but when I tried to replace the bottom piece, it wouldn’t hold. The latch seems to be defective and there are gaps between the bottom and sides that would surely leak batter if I tried to use it again. Will be returning this now useless item.
customer_reviews.author: LCO

customer_reviews.title: It's small and shallow. If you don't mind that, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.text: my son-in-law used it. He like it. I haven't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: G. Tirebiter

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great little pan. Got to my house quick. I used it right away to make a cheesecake and it worked just like it should. Plus the packaging was cute
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just what I needed to make a cheese cake inside my InstantPOT pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: OnAgain

customer_reviews.title: Fits in my InstaPot
customer_reviews.text: The red color. Description of this product was right on.
customer_reviews.author: dwitt

customer_reviews.title: It has multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: This pan is not only good as a small spring form pan, but I was pleased to see that it not only fit the 6qt. instant pot, it also fits the Phillips XL air fryer. It will be one of my go-to pans for a lot of things.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

product_meta.title: Springform Pan, MCIRCO 7" Non-stick Cake Pan Cheesecake Pan Leakproof Round Pan 7 Inch Cake Pan for Instant Pot with Removable Waffle Bottom and Quick-Release Latch Red Coating
feature_bullets: Durable heavy gauge steel construction with nonstick coating for effortless release. Perfect 7 inch size for 6Qt or 8Qt instant pot pressure cooker.
Spring latch offering a tight leak-proof seal makes baking mess-free with an easy cleanup.
Heat-resistance temperature: 445℉ (230℃);Made of a strong, durable, substantial material, BPA free, nontoxic black and red nonstick coating. Microwave oven safe.
Hand wash only. Choose soft tools and mild detergent when you clean it to protect non-stick coating. Avoid sharp and rough tools to scratch the pan.
180 Days Quality Assurance Guarantee; If you have any problem with your order, we would be happy to issue you a full refund or send you a replacement.
